outputs.output_descr:
The project will enable the assessment of capacity building needs for St. Kitts and Nevis, the preparation of the second national report for the submittion to the Conference of Parties and the development of a country-driven biodiversity Chearing House Mechanims (CHM) project.  The outputs associated with this project are:-  
Output 1. Procurement of hardware and software to support the establishment of a Clearing House Mechanism.
Output 2. Provision of targeted Information and Communication Technology training for Clearing House Mechanism forcal point and data providers.
Output 3. Public awareness to introduce the Clearing House Mechanism to the public and invite or encourage the use of the system.

project_descr: ST. KITTS AND NEVIS ENABLING ACTIVITY:  ASSESSMENT OF CAPACITY BUILDING NEEDS AND COUNTRY SPECIFIC PRIORITIES
